markdown: The transfer fee for different membership categories is seventy percent (70%) of the initiation fee then in effect for the membership classification for which the application is made, plus any applicable taxes [Doc:09.17.2024F#Page 7]. For reinstatement, a resigned Member applying to rejoin the Club must pay an initiation fee for Foundation membership equal to the Foundation initiation fee then in effect, reduced by 75% within the first year after resignation, 50% within the second year, and 25% within the third year, along with any applicable taxes [Doc:09.17.2024F#Page 7].
